alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Franklin County through 900 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Carrabelle to 6 miles south of St George Island. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Carrabelle Beach, Alligator Point, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Royal Bluff, Mcintyre, Yent Place, Lanark Village and St George Island St Pk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
